mapper.sql: id, code, sku_code, sku_name, be_disable, categories_supply_channels_code, categories_supply_channels_name, direct_delivery_supplier_code, direct_delivery_supplier_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, company_code, company_name
mapper.select:
select a.id from product_sku_sale_area_main a left join product_sku_sale_area c on a.code = c.code where a.company_code = #{companyCode}
and a.code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and c.code like concat('%',#{allowAreaProvince},'%') and c.type = 1
and c.name like concat('%',#{allowAreaCity},'%') and c.type = 2
group by a.id order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into product_sku_sale_area (id, code, sku_code, sku_name, be_disable, categories_supply_channels_code, categories_supply_channels_name, direct_delivery_supplier_code, direct_delivery_supplier_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, company_code, company_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beDisable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directDeliverySupplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directDeliverySupplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into product_sku_sale_area ( code, sku_code, sku_name, be_disable, categories_supply_channels_code, categories_supply_channels_name, direct_delivery_supplier_code, direct_delivery_supplier_name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, company_code, company_name) values ( #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beDisable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directDeliverySupplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directDeliverySupplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update product_sku_sale_area
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku_name = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
be_disable = #{beDisable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
categories_supply_channels_code = #{categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
categories_supply_channels_name = #{categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
direct_delivery_supplier_code = #{directDeliverySupplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
direct_delivery_supplier_name = #{directDeliverySupplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update product_sku_sale_area set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sku_name = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, be_disable = #{beDisable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, categories_supply_channels_code = #{categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, categories_supply_channels_name = #{categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, direct_delivery_supplier_code = #{directDeliverySupplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, direct_delivery_supplier_name = #{directDeliverySupplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select b.code from product_sku_sale_area a inner join product_sku_sale_area_main b on a.code = b.code
b.be_disable = 0 and be_effective = 1 and selection_effective_time = 0 and a.sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ps.id from product_sku ps left join product_sku_sale_area c on ps.sku_code = c.sku_code left join product_sku_sale_area_main a on a.code = c.code
ps.del_flag = 0 and a.company_code = #{companyCode}
AND ps.sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ps.sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND ps.product_category_code like CONCAT(#{productCategoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND ps.product_category_name like CONCAT(#{productCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and ps.product_property_code = #{productPropertyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ps.product_property_name like CONCAT( #{productPropertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and ps.categories_supply_channels_code like CONCAT( "%", #{categoriesSupplyChannelsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and ps.categories_supply_channels_name like CONCAT("%", #{categoriesSupplyChannelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and a.code like CONCAT("%", #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and a.name like CONCAT("%", #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and a.be_disable like CONCAT("%", #{beDisable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and ps.procurement_section_code in (select purchase_group_code from purchase_group_buyer where buyer_code =#{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
